MEKKO.HE.summary: Marimekko Oyj, a clothing and textile design company, designs, manufactures, markets, wholesales, and retails clothing, bags and accessories, and interior decoration products. The company offers various clothes, such as dresses, tops and tunics, coats and jackets, skirts, trousers, knits, and nightwear and loungewear for women, as well as unisex and kids clothing products. It also provides leather, canvas, shoulder, cosmetic, and handbags, as well as backpacks, purses, and wallets; printed fabrics; kitchen and dining products, home decor products, bed linen, blankets and throws, towels, and bathrobes and slippers; and accessories, including shoes, hats, scarves, socks, and umbrellas. In addition, the company is also involved in licensing activities. It sells its products through a network 154 stores, including own retail stores, retailer-owned Marimekko stores, and shop-in-shops, as well as through online stores. Marimekko Oyj was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.
